info.name: insert_missing_io_tags
info.description: It returns all the paths and file objects of mr_files inside the source directory.

input.name: xml_files
input.description: It is provided all the xml files of the source_path directory and its subdirectories.

output.name: filled_xml_files
output.description: It saves the xml files with additional generated content.

output.name: file_missing_errors
output.description: It prints an error when an xml file is not there and exits.
